<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BreakCriticalEdges pass - Break all of the critical edges in the CFG by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting a dummy basic block.  This pass may be &quot;required&quot; by passes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot deal with critical edges.  For this usage, the structure type is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// forward declared.  This pass obviously invalidates the CFG, but can update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominator trees.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> LoopPreds;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if extra modifications will be required to preserve loop-simplify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form after splitting. If it would require splitting blocks with IndirectBr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminators, bail out if preserving loop-simplify form is requested.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;TIL = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(TIBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only way that we can break LoopSimplify form by splitting a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// critical edge is if after the split there exists some edge from TIL to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DestBB &#42;and&#42; the only edge into DestBB from outside of TIL is that of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewBB. If the first isn&#39;t true, then LoopSimplify still holds, NewBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the new exit block and it has no non-loop predecessors. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// second isn&#39;t true, then DestBB was not in LoopSimplify form prior to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the split as it had a non-loop predecessor. In both of these cases,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the predecessor must be directly in TIL, not in a subloop, or again</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopSimplify doesn&#39;t hold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(DestBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> == TIBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new block is known.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI-&gt;getLoopFor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) != TIL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to re-simplify, it wasn&#39;t to start with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoopPreds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LoopPreds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop-simplify form can be preserved, if we can split all in-loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(LoopPreds, &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;IndirectBrInst&gt;</a>(Pred-&gt;getTerminator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.PreserveLoopSimplify)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LoopPreds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a new basic block, linking it into the CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#a4c1c1093a7749409c70838678514cc7c">str</a>() != </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>(), BBName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     DestBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#adb5c319f5905c1d3ca9eb5df546388c5">getName</a>() +</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create our unconditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;NewBI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a9f40e42226cee617c16cb1c447b115c5">BranchInst::Create</a>(DestBB, NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NewBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ae8f5bf5cc06f696b52c709677df00fbf">setDebugLoc</a>(TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a4b8faae4ff9e7434a1d226d03d15dcd2">getDebugLoc</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the block into the function... right after the block TI lives in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = &#42;TIBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a19595c245bd2e3eefa93ce22db5ad15f">Function::iterator</a> FBBI = TIBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.insert(++FBBI, NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch to the new block, breaking the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ae959364e4640ac025bbc046d3d7c7e61">setSuccessor</a>(SuccNum, NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are any PHI nodes in DestBB, we need to update them so that they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// merge incoming values from NewBB instead of from TIBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DestBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We no longer enter through TIBB, now we come in through NewBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Revector exactly one entry in the PHI node that used to come from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TIBB to come from NewBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reuse the previous value of BBIdx if it lines up.  In cases where we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have multiple phi nodes with &#42;lots&#42; of predecessors, this is a speed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// win because we don&#39;t have to scan the PHI looking for TIBB.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// happens because the BB list of PHI nodes are usually in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#ac53e1aabdf64e91b8b325bcac250d8a9">getIncomingBlock</a>(BBIdx) != TIBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BBIdx = PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#ae9562b96f6f3fa41bd36538c080035ee">getBasicBlockIndex</a>(TIBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a5ba57877c55dfdbe6e3bbfdacd9ef8c1">setIncomingBlock</a>(BBIdx, NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are any other edges from TIBB to DestBB, update those to go</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through the split block, making those edges non-critical as well (and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reducing the number of phi entries in the DestBB if relevant).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.MergeIdenticalEdges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = SuccNum+1, e = TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a3287172f2d13af086e6d66364e8c6de3">getNumSuccessors</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6e5d2e18c81baaeec7dadc81a0dea993">getSuccessor</a>(i) != DestBB) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove an entry for TIBB from DestBB phi nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DestBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#afe7af0c3ec2ef1f525173acd2ea4ba60">removePredecessor</a>(TIBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.KeepOneInputPHIs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found another edge to DestBB, go to NewBB instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ae959364e4640ac025bbc046d3d7c7e61">setSuccessor</a>(i, NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have nothing to update, just return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DT = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.DT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PDT = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.PDT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MSSAU = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.MSSAU;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MSSAU)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MSSAU-&gt;wireOldPredecessorsToNewImmediatePredecessor(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DestBB, NewBB, &#123;TIBB&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.MergeIdenticalEdges);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DT &amp;&amp; !PDT &amp;&amp; !LI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT || PDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the DominatorTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ---&gt; NewBB -----\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    //      /                 V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  TIBB -------\\\\------&gt; DestBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, inform the DT about the new path from TIBB to DestBB via NewBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then delete the old edge from TIBB to DestBB. By doing this in that order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DestBB stays reachable in the DT the whole time and its subtree doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// get disconnected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DominatorTree::UpdateType, 3&gt;</a> Updates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Updates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a9aeeca2833810f01b20545a46fe22503">DominatorTree::Insert</a>, TIBB, NewBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Updates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a9aeeca2833810f01b20545a46fe22503">DominatorTree::Insert</a>, NewBB, DestBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(TIBB), DestBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Updates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a71c91cbbfc1c0ecf9a69e10ccf739bd7">DominatorTree::Delete</a>, TIBB, DestBB&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DT-&gt;applyUpdates(Updates);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PDT)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PDT-&gt;applyUpdates(Updates);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update LoopInfo if it is around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;TIL = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(TIBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one or the other blocks were not in a loop, the new block is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either, and thus LI doesn&#39;t need to be updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;DestLoop = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(DestBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TIL == DestLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both in the same loop, the NewBB joins loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DestLoop-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(NewBB, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TIL-&gt;contains(DestLoop)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edge from an outer loop to an inner loop.  Add to the outer loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">          TIL-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(NewBB, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DestLoop-&gt;contains(TIL)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edge from an inner loop to an outer loop.  Add to the outer loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DestLoop-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(NewBB, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edge from two loops with no containment relation.  Because these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are natural loops, we know that the destination block must be the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// header of its loop (adding a branch into a loop elsewhere would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create an irreducible loop).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DestLoop-&gt;getHeader() == DestBB &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should not create irreducible loops!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = DestLoop-&gt;getParentLoop())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point Target only has PHIs, and BodyBlock has the rest of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block&#39;s body. Create a copy of Target that will be used by the &quot;direct&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> VMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DirectSucc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1c8d384f90fc9d69d7fcdf920138cf2">CloneBasicBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>, VMap, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.clone&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> BlockFreqForDirectSucc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : OtherPreds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target is a loop to itself, then the terminator of the split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block (BodyBlock) needs to be updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Src = Pred != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> ? Pred : BodyBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Src-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>, DirectSucc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShouldUpdateAnalysis)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BlockFreqForDirectSucc += BFI-&gt;getBlockFreq(Src) &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">            BPI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobabilityinfo/#a46502d648608aa13cb485ed4af447d88">getEdgeProbability</a>(Src, DirectSucc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShouldUpdateAnalysis) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BFI-&gt;setBlockFreq(DirectSucc, BlockFreqForDirectSucc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> NewBlockFreqForTarget =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BFI-&gt;getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>) - BlockFreqForDirectSucc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BFI-&gt;setBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>, NewBlockFreqForTarget);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ok, now fix up the PHIs. We know the two blocks only have PHIs, and that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they are clones, so the number of PHIs are the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (a) Remove the edge coming from IBRPred from the &quot;Direct&quot; PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (b) Leave that as the only edge in the &quot;Indirect&quot; PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (c) Merge the two in the body block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Indirect = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>-&gt;begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         End = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a>-&gt;getFirstNonPHIIt();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Direct = DirectSucc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> MergeInsert = BodyBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a161fd4e9fa5367f64c2a4c9e921c3ad3">getFirstInsertionPt</a>();</span></CodeLine>
